trans-unit.source: How to provide secure remote access to on-premises apps
trans-unit.target: How to provide secure remote access to on-premises apps

trans-unit.source: Covers how to use Azure AD Application Proxy to provide secure remote access to your on-premises apps.
trans-unit.target: Covers how to use Azure AD Application Proxy to provide secure remote access to your on-premises apps.

trans-unit.source: You want to provide access for remote users who have all kinds of devices – managed, unmanaged; tablets, smartphones and laptops.
trans-unit.target: You want to provide access for remote users who have all kinds of devices – managed, unmanaged; tablets, smartphones and laptops.

trans-unit.source: And providing secure access to a myriad of resources can be complex.
trans-unit.target: And providing secure access to a myriad of resources can be complex.

trans-unit.source: In recent years, reverse proxies were a popular way to provide secure remote access, but they needed to be behind firewalls which were hard to secure and hard to make highly available.
trans-unit.target: In recent years, reverse proxies were a popular way to provide secure remote access, but they needed to be behind firewalls which were hard to secure and hard to make highly available.

trans-unit.source: In a modern cloud environment, we take remote access to the next level using Application Proxy in Microsoft Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In a modern cloud environment, we take remote access to the next level using Application Proxy in Microsoft Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Application Proxy is a feature of Azure AD that is supplied as a service, meaning that it’s easy to deploy and use.
trans-unit.target: Application Proxy is a feature of Azure AD that is supplied as a service, meaning that it’s easy to deploy and use.

trans-unit.source: It integrates with Azure Active Directory, the same identity platform that is used by Office 365.
trans-unit.target: It integrates with Azure Active Directory, the same identity platform that is used by Office 365.

trans-unit.source: Application Proxy provides single-sign-on and secure remote access for web applications hosted on-premises, such as such as SharePoint sites and Outlook Web Access.
trans-unit.target: Application Proxy provides single-sign-on and secure remote access for web applications hosted on-premises, such as such as SharePoint sites and Outlook Web Access.

trans-unit.source: Your on-premises web applications can now be accessed the same way as your SaaS apps in Azure Active Directory, without the need for a VPN or changing the network infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Your on-premises web applications can now be accessed the same way as your SaaS apps in Azure Active Directory, without the need for a VPN or changing the network infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: Application Proxy lets you publish applications.
trans-unit.target: Application Proxy lets you publish applications.

trans-unit.source: Employees can log into your apps from home, on their own devices and authenticate through this cloud-based proxy.
trans-unit.target: Employees can log into your apps from home, on their own devices and authenticate through this cloud-based proxy.

trans-unit.source: Application Proxy works by installing a slim Windows Server service called the Connector inside your network.
trans-unit.target: Application Proxy works by installing a slim Windows Server service called the Connector inside your network.

trans-unit.source: The Connector doesn’t necessitate opening any inbound ports and you don’t have to put anything in the DMZ.
trans-unit.target: The Connector doesn’t necessitate opening any inbound ports and you don’t have to put anything in the DMZ.

trans-unit.source: If you have a lot of traffic to your apps you can add more Connectors, and the service will take care of the load balancing.
trans-unit.target: If you have a lot of traffic to your apps you can add more Connectors, and the service will take care of the load balancing.

trans-unit.source: The Connectors are stateless and pull everything from the cloud as necessary.
trans-unit.target: The Connectors are stateless and pull everything from the cloud as necessary.

trans-unit.source: When a user accesses applications remotely, from any device, he’s authenticated by Azure Active Directory and gets access to the application.
trans-unit.target: When a user accesses applications remotely, from any device, he’s authenticated by Azure Active Directory and gets access to the application.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Application proxy provides single sign-on (SSO) to applications that use IWA or claims-aware applications.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Application proxy provides single sign-on (SSO) to applications that use IWA or claims-aware applications.

trans-unit.source: If your application uses Integrated Windows Authentication, Application Proxy impersonates the user using Kerberos Constrained Delegation to provide SSO.
trans-unit.target: If your application uses Integrated Windows Authentication, Application Proxy impersonates the user using Kerberos Constrained Delegation to provide SSO.

trans-unit.source: SSO to claims-aware applications is achieved because the user was already authenticated by Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: SSO to claims-aware applications is achieved because the user was already authenticated by Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have an Azure AD basic or premium subscription and an Azure AD directory for which you are a global administrator.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you have an Azure AD basic or premium subscription and an Azure AD directory for which you are a global administrator.

trans-unit.source: You also need Azure AD basic or premium licenses for the directory administrator and users accessing the apps.
trans-unit.target: You also need Azure AD basic or premium licenses for the directory administrator and users accessing the apps.

trans-unit.source: Take a look here for more information.
trans-unit.target: Take a look here for more information.

trans-unit.source: Setting up Application Proxy is accomplished in two steps:
trans-unit.target: Setting up Application Proxy is accomplished in two steps:

trans-unit.source: Enable Application Proxy and configure the Connector
trans-unit.target: Enable Application Proxy and configure the Connector

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Publish applications</linkText><title></title> - use the quick and easy wizard to get your on-premises apps published and accessible remotely.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Publish applications</linkText><title></title> - use the quick and easy wizard to get your on-premises apps published and accessible remotely.

trans-unit.target: There's a lot more you can do with Application Proxy:
